data.title: Axon Underwriting
data.text:
Paul joined Axon in May 2021 as Assistant Vice President, where he is responsible for underwriting and developing AXON’s Architects & Engineers and Miscellaneous Professional Liability products, primarily for the West Coast region.

Paul has over 30 years’ experience in underwriting and leadership, beginning his insurance career as Surety Bond Underwriter for the Aetna Casualty & Surety Company, with a concentration on Contract Surety business. Paul subsequently underwrote and developed Surety and Professional Liability business with such carriers as International Fidelity Insurance Company, RLI, AIG, Hiscox, and Argo Group prior to joining AXON.

Paul is a proud graduate of Manhattan College with a BA Degree in Government & Politics.
